text: Matthew Thomas "Matt" Ryan (born May 17, 1985), nicknamed "Matty Ice", is the starting American football quarterback for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He was the 3rd person drafted in the 2008 NFL Draft. He played college football at Boston College. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:American football quarterbacks
title: Matt Ryan (American football)
